item.title: 【Instrumentals / Karaoke (lossless)】PACK - Instrumentals Pack 1 (Memento Mori, Lost Demos, Hourglass, Violator)
item.description:
So uhhhh... Long time no see!

For the past few weeks i've been collecting and creating instrumentals for some of my favourite artists. It was quite a hard job tbh, since creating some of these instrumentals via Demucs and Audacity were quite a pain in the arse, and also some instrumentals (for example: Hourglass) were quite difficult to obtain.

Anyways, as a welcome back gift, here's a first pack of these instrumentals! I'll be releasing these packs once every few weeks (most likely every 2-3 weeks. Maybe once every week). Without further ado, here's the info!:


Package Content:

Depeche Mode - Memento Mori (24/44.1 WAV [stems extracted from 16/44.1 FLAC remastered files, fanmade])

Linkin Park - Lost Demos (24/44.1 WAV [stems extracted from 24/96 FLAC files, fanmade])

Dave Gahan - Hourglass (16/44.1 FLAC, semi-official)

Depeche Mode - Violator (tracks 1-6, 8, 9, 11-13, 16: 16/44.1 FLAC [extracted from a semi-official instrumental playlist.] rest of the tracks: 24/44.1 WAV [stems extracted from 16/44.1, fanmade])



Link:
Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.



Enjoy The Files!​
item.author: Pjorun
